name: Emily Chen
persona: Emily Chen is a 20-year-old biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.30. She is driven by a strong desire to achieve her academic goals and is diligent in managing her coursework, showing good perseverance even when faced with difficult subjects. While she occasionally feels anxious before exams, her self-discipline and confidence in her academic abilities help her stay on track. Emily is motivated by her passion for science and aspires to pursue graduate studies after completing her undergraduate degree.
